andromeda.why: Inner incubation of authentic style is personal, not collective sovereignty/reclamation (Andromeda core).

arcturus.why: No field triage, pacing, or coherence-restoration—this is self-sourced creativity, not regulation (Arcturus).

draco.why: No dominance, rank-enforcement, or predator vigilance in this line’s theme.

lyra.why: Pure, original creative emanation—beauty/aesthetic enchantment as signal (Lyra core).

orion-dark.why: No obedience machinery, brand coercion, or empire-building present.

orion-light.why: Not a trial/ordeal motif; it’s innate creation, not initiatory testing.

pleiades.why: Subtle sensitivity to being unseen can accompany nascent self-expression (minor Pleiadian tone).

sirius.why: No sacred-instruction or liberation-through-teaching vector—this is pre-teaching, inward artistry.

andromeda.why: Authenticity under pressure ≠ anti-domination rescue or chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Theme is image/recognition tension, not nervous-system care or field decongestion.

draco.why: When insecure, can slip into peacocking/status posturing (Draco distortion).

lyra.why: Refining authentic style despite pressure is still Lyran creative essence.

orion-dark.why: Externalized performance to meet hierarchy’s gaze; compliance-seeking fame pressure.

orion-light.why: No honorable ordeal theme; it’s about recognition insecurity, not trial.

pleiades.why: Heightened sensitivity to being seen/accepted and fear of abandonment colors this line.

sirius.why: No explicit transmission/teaching current; the work is intra-personal.

andromeda.why: Trial-and-error for authentic voice, not intervention to free others.

arcturus.why: Iterative identity, not structured repair/calibration of a dysregulated field.

draco.why: Frustration may morph into comparative one-upmanship (Draco distortion).

lyra.why: Creative voice forged publicly through experimentation—classic Lyran craft arc.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to trends for approval can hijack the experimentation.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal vibe: repeated tests refine integrity and courage to be original.

pleiades.why: Emotional sensitivity to feedback shapes how one persists.

sirius.why: No explicit sacred-law transmission; this is self-forging before teaching others.

andromeda.why: Influence-through-style ≠ sovereignty defense or anti-captivity action.

arcturus.why: No frequency triage or container-building; it’s culture-setting via signal.

draco.why: Attention can invite status games or gatekeeping (Draco distortion).

lyra.why: Stable aesthetic beacon others align around—Lyran cultural imprint.

orion-dark.why: Signal may ossify into hierarchy/brand compliance if over-identified.

orion-light.why: Not a trial rite; more about consistency of personal muse.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement to audience subtly shapes the broadcast.

sirius.why: Teaching-by-being: others receive instruction implicitly from the consistent example (Sirius transmission-lite).

andromeda.why: Projection/fame dynamics ≠ liberation or anti-oppression action.

arcturus.why: Not a care/repair pattern; public expectation is the axis here.

draco.why: Spotlight can tempt dominance-posturing and clique enforcement.

lyra.why: Taste-setter artistry defining the vibe—classic Lyran cultural leadership.

orion-dark.why: Projected icon risks being captured by hierarchy/brand obedience.

orion-light.why: Not a courage-trial per se; it’s reputation management vs integrity.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing and approval-seeking can dilute authenticity.

sirius.why: Exposure enables transmission—audience learns through your lived standard (Sirius pedagogy-by-presence).

andromeda.why: Mentoring authenticity isn’t a rescue/anti-domination mission.

arcturus.why: Legacy authenticity ≠ crisis de-escalation or field cleaning.

draco.why: Authority can calcify into elitism or status protectionism if unchecked.

lyra.why: Embodied, unforced creative truth becomes the cultural standard (Lyran apex).

orion-dark.why: Followers may demand conformity; risk of codifying a hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Subtle initiatory quality: holding the line invites others to rise.

pleiades.why: Focus is exemplar integrity, not bonding/soothing dynamics.

sirius.why: Mentor-by-being; transmission of higher law through lived example—royal teacher current (Sirius).
